snippet.title: Tavern Talk: Launch Trailer | 20.06.2024
snippet.description:
The Wayfarer's Inn is a safe haven for a colorful cast of characters inspired by popular tropes from fantasy TTRPGs. Get to know their unique personalities, quirks and flaws, and help them find a place that feels like home while you play as the tavern owner in Tavern Talk. 💜

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2076140/Tavern_Talk/

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/EshZWmcTDT

Directed by Tommaso Crogliano
Animation & Art by Nika Gorev & Clara Furtwängler
Edit by Tommaso Crogliano
Musik by Filippo Beck Peccoz: www.fbpsound.com 
And Lilith Max: https://lilithmax.com/
